Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Hydrax::HydraxComponent

Hydrax flags to select components wich we want to use. 0 for none, 1 for all.

Enumerator:
HYDRAX_COMPONENT_SUN 
HYDRAX_COMPONENT_FOAM 
HYDRAX_COMPONENT_DEPTH 
HYDRAX_COMPONENT_SMOOTH  Smooth transitions and caustics components need depth component.
HYDRAX_COMPONENT_CAUSTICS 
HYDRAX_COMPONENT_UNDERWATER 
HYDRAX_COMPONENT_UNDERWATER_REFLECTIONS  Underwater reflections and god rays need underwater component.
HYDRAX_COMPONENT_UNDERWATER_GODRAYS 
HYDRAX_COMPONENTS_NONE 
HYDRAX_COMPONENTS_ALL
